data.text: @CityNewsVAN Not clear however why these tests are needed if most of us are vaccinated. Unless the government and the media see this as a needed measure to justify an otherwise false pandemic. I am ready to bet that 1 in 5 of these tests will be positive… no matter what they test.
@CityNewsVAN Probably not a long lineup … just very slow & methodical.
@CityNewsVAN This has been going on in Alberta for well over a month….but yes all the NDP mock The #ucp for incompetence….#socialismkills
@CityNewsVAN If anyone thinks that testing for covid will have any impact on spread or inevitability of getting covid, they are delusional.
@CityNewsVAN Who cares, I mean really who cares since Canada refuses to do anything about early treatment it literally doesn't matter. You either get sick and live or you don't, move on
@CityNewsVAN Woulda been nice if they mailed our seniors their kits...but cheap asf for the win.

@CityNewsVAN I would stay away from ANYTHING related to Big Pharma and Covid for awhile! These kits may have issues with them and as usual, we NEVER hear anything about it from the Healthcare system or the media! https://t.co/OoXbOQNg2E
